item.title: Entrepreneurial Thinking: get your team in a business mindset.
item.description: You don't have to be a CEO to think like an entrepreneur. Good teams are chock full of 'em. - This week former startup founder and current entrepreneurial employee Brian Junker-Latocha will be pitching entrepreneurial thinking. Think Business Why should employees benefit from thinking business, even if their salary isn’t directly dependent on company profits? Why should founders foster a spirit of entrepreneurial collaboration in their team members, even if...

item.title: Huddle Up: Beers and Whiteboards
item.description: Hello entrepreneurs and innovators! Join us tonight, 9 August, at 6:30pm for our weekly mind-meld :) - The startup huddle is your arena to test out new ideas or just bounce some thoughts off like-minded peers in your region. Learn where others are struggling and succeeding, and optimize your approaches, together. Room For Change Mathildenstr 18 63065 Offenbach It’s kinda last minute but we’re hoping to maintain...
